name: UpdateWorkweekConfiguration
description:
Update workweek configuration settings.

Use this tool to update the settings for a specific workweek configuration in the system.

parameters.name: workweek_config_id
parameters.description: The UUID for the `WorkweekConfig` object to be updated.

value_schema.description: The UUID for the `WorkweekConfig` object being updated.

parameters.name: workweek_start_day
parameters.description: Specifies the start day of the workweek. Acceptable values are: MON, TUE, WED, THU, FRI, SAT, SUN.

parameters.name: workweek_start_time_local
parameters.description: The local time a business week starts, represented as a string in `HH:MM` format (`HH:MM:SS` is accepted, but seconds are truncated).

value_schema.description:
The local time at which a business week starts. Represented as a
string in `HH:MM` format (`HH:MM:SS` is also accepted, but seconds are
truncated).

parameters.name: workweek_config_uuid
parameters.description: The UUID of the workweek configuration object to be updated.

parameters.name: workweek_config_version
parameters.description: Version number to resolve concurrency issues. If it doesn't match the server, the update fails. If omitted, a blind write occurs.

value_schema.description:
Used for resolving concurrency issues. The request fails if the version
provided does not match the server version at the time of the request. If not provided,
Square executes a blind write; potentially overwriting data from another
write.

parameters.name: workweek_creation_timestamp
parameters.description: Read-only UTC timestamp of workweek config creation in RFC 3339 format.

value_schema.description: A read-only timestamp in RFC 3339 format; presented in UTC.

parameters.name: read_only_updated_at
parameters.description: A read-only timestamp in RFC 3339 format; presented in UTC, to indicate the last update time of the workweek configuration.

value_schema.description: A read-only timestamp in RFC 3339 format; presented in UTC.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the squareup API.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The UUID for the `WorkweekConfig` object being updated.

value_schema.description: The UUID for the `WorkweekConfig` object being updated.

parameters.name: workweek_config.start_of_day_local_time
parameters.description:
The local time at which a business week starts. Represented as a
string in `HH:MM` format (`HH:MM:SS` is also accepted, but seconds are
truncated).

value_schema.description:
The local time at which a business week starts. Represented as a
string in `HH:MM` format (`HH:MM:SS` is also accepted, but seconds are
truncated).

parameters.name: workweek_config.version
parameters.description:
Used for resolving concurrency issues. The request fails if the version
provided does not match the server version at the time of the request. If not provided,
Square executes a blind write; potentially overwriting data from another
write.

value_schema.description:
Used for resolving concurrency issues. The request fails if the version
provided does not match the server version at the time of the request. If not provided,
Square executes a blind write; potentially overwriting data from another
write.

parameters.name: workweek_config.created_at
parameters.description: A read-only timestamp in RFC 3339 format; presented in UTC.

value_schema.description: A read-only timestamp in RFC 3339 format; presented in UTC.

parameters.name: workweek_config.updated_at
parameters.description: A read-only timestamp in RFC 3339 format; presented in UTC.

value_schema.description: A read-only timestamp in RFC 3339 format; presented in UTC.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
